mapper.select: SELECT a.loans_id, a.mem_id, a.book_id, b.book_tit, a.loans_date, a.return_date, b.book_img FROM loans a INNER JOIN book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} order by loans_id

SELECT a.loans_id, a.mem_id, a.book_id, b.book_tit, a.loans_date, a.return_date, a.overdue_date, case when trunc(sysdate - a.overdue_date, 0) > 0 then trunc(sysdate - a.overdue_date, 0) end overdue, b.book_img FROM loans a INNER JOIN book b ON a.book_id = b.book_id WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} and lower(loans_yn) = 'n' order by loans_id
